{"id":989775583,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 1 week","timestamp":1688871589,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/989775583/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Non-decreasing Subarray From Two Arrays","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxNonDecreasingLength(vector<int>& nums1, vector<int>& nums2) {\n        int n=nums1.size();\n        vector<int>ans(n,0);\n        ans[0]=min(nums1[0],nums2[0]);\n        int mnm = ans[0];\n        for(int i=1;i<n;i++){\n            if(nums1[i]>mnm&&nums2[i]>mnm){\n ans[i]=min(nums1[i],nums2[i]);  \n                mnm= ans[i];\n            }\n            else if(nums1[i]==mnm||nums2[i]==mnm){\n                if(nums1[i]==mnm){\n                    ans[i]=nums1[i];\n                }else ans[i]=nums2[i];\n                \n                mnm= ans[i];\n            }\n            else{\n                ans[i]= max(nums1[i],nums2[i]);\n                mnm= ans[i];\n            }\n            \n        }\n        \n        int cnt=1,mxm=0;\n        for(int i=1;i<n;i++){\n            // cout<<ans[i]<<\" \";\n            mxm=max(mxm,cnt);\n            if(ans[i]>=ans[i-1]){cnt++; }\n            else {\n                cnt=1;\n            }\n                        mxm=max(mxm,cnt);\n        }\n                    mxm=max(mxm,cnt);\n        return mxm;\n    }\n};\n\n//  nums1 = [1,3,2,1], nums2 = [2,2,3,4]","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-non-decreasing-subarray-from-two-arrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
